page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN BIGGLESWADE
page.content: Although the area as a whole is orientated towards agriculture and market gardening, there has been a recent shift to light industry, and Biggleswade now has a substantial industrial area. Manufacturing pro- cesses include electronic connectors, glass-reinforced plastics, machine tools, electronic systems, industrial robots and glass fibre mouldings. Other industries include the manu- facture of lingerie, toys & games, office furniture and joinery, metal scrap processing, and several firms who specialise in the complete range of design & printing services.
